data.name: Elroy And The Aliens
data.detailed_description:
Elroy And The Aliens is a hand-drawn classic point & click adventure game.

Elroy is a young rocket engineer whose father disappeared 18 years ago in suspicious circumstances.
Peggie is a hot shot reporter with a knack for languages, history and research.

Together, they uncover a secret that takes them on a journey of epic, world-saving proportions!

Features:
  • Classic point-and-click adventure game.
  • Story full of mystery, character development, ancient legends, alien language and occasional pop culture references.
  • Challenging puzzles.
  • Spanning 2 planets, 60 locations and featuring more than 60 characters.
  • Hand-drawn 2D animations.
  • Original music score.
  • Fully-voiced characters.

7 years ago, we decided to focus all of our energy on one game. No in-app purchases, no free-to-play, just a very sincere attempt at pouring all our passion, ideas, creativity and love into a lovely adventure game.

Since we are hand-crafting Elroy And The Aliens the old-school way in 2D, we knew from the beginning that this will be no easy endeavor. But you know what? We love it and we can not wait to bring the game to your screens. :)

Thanks for tuning in! And please add the game to your wishlist -- it will mean a lot!

Motiviti Team

data.short_description: Elroy And The Aliens is classic point & click adventure game, hand-drawn and animated in 2D. Full of sci-fi tropes, ancient secrets, conspiracies, talking robots, emotional drama and... aliens!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
